name: Jean_Jacques_Renault
text:
Jean Jacques Renault
Jean Jacques Renault was a Canadian criminal.
In October 1914, Renault traveled to Twin Peaks, Washington to assist. Ersel Martell in a knife fight against Thomas Packard. The fight either stemmed from jealousy over a girl or an insult toward Renault. After the fight, Renault fled back to Canada.
Renault later established the Renault Gang, infamous for smuggling whisky from Canada into the United States during Prohibition.
